A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie contained enough beautiful shots and witty bits of humor to earn a second star\, but all things considered this was the most bitterly disappointing movie I have ever watched.\n\nIt's far from the worst movie I have ever seen\, but it is certainly the most disappointing.  The Last Jedi is everything I feared the sequel trilogy would become and worse.  I don't have time to pick apart every glaring flaw\, so I will just say that this simply wasn't a Star Wars movie.  It was such a depressing let down that it literally made me want to cry.
